title: Handshake

adjectives: A symbol of mutual understanding and accord.
verbs: To signify a successful negotiation or a friendly welcome.
nouns: The act of reaching a consensus or forming a bond.

description: Represents agreement, a deal, a pact, or a friendly greeting between two people.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the handshake emoji, rendered without specific skin tones, presents two hands clasping firmly, a symbol of unity and agreement. Apple's smooth gradients and clean lines give the hands a polished and professional appearance, with subtle highlights indicating their connection. This emoji strongly conveys trust, collaboration, and the finalization of a deal or understanding.
